description: Try our easy to follow Marzipan Oranges recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Confectionery,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Marzipan Oranges Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the marzipan and food coloring in a bowl until combined. For each orange, roll 25g of the mixture into a ball. Roll the ball over the course, star-shaped side of a box grater. Push a clove into the top. Use the blunt edge of a knife to make crease marks around the clove.
